* Die Hard (1988) - Another classic action movie starring Bruce Willis as a detective who must stop a group of terrorists from robbing a high-rise office building on Christmas Eve.
* Mad Max: Fury Road (2015) - An adrenaline-fueled post-apocalyptic adventure starring Tom Hardy and Charlize Theron as they battle against the tyrannical Immortan Joe in a world gone mad. Both movies are known for their intense action sequences, stylish visuals, and memorable characters.
